text: "Diddy" is a song by American hip hop recording artist P. Diddy, featuring vocals from American singer Pharrell Williams. was released on 2001 as the third single of his third studio album The Saga Continues..., with the record labels Bad Boy Records and Arista Records.http://www.allmusic.com/song/diddy- mt0005529919 The song was produced by The Neptunes. The hook line is inspired by "Jimmy" a former Hip Hop track by the Rap group Boogie Down Productionshttps://www.discogs.com/P-Diddy-Feat-Neptunes-Diddy/release/2211846 == Charts == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2001) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| Belgium Bubbling Under (Ultratop Wallonia) Ultratop Bubbling Under. |align="center"| 14 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:Sean Combs songs Category:Pharrell Williams songs Category:Song recordings produced by The Neptunes Category:Songs written by Sean Combs Category:Songs written by Pharrell Williams Category:Songs written by Chad Hugo Category:2001 singles Category:Bad Boy Records singles Category:2001 songs Category:Songs written by Loon (rapper)
title: Diddy (song)
